= Usage =

*Step 1*

In your project's pom.xml add the following:
{{{
<build>
	<plugins>
		<plugin>
			<groupId>com.google.code</groupId>
			<artifactId>jboss-jmx</artifactId>
			<version>0.1</version>
			<configuration>
				<serverHost>127.0.0.1</serverHost>
				<serverPort>8080</serverPort>
				<jmxConsoleUser>admin</jmxConsoleUser>
				<jmxConsolePassword>adminadmin</jmxConsolePassword>
			</configuration>
		</plugin>
	</plugins>
</build>
}}}

*Step 2*

execute the _jboss-jmx:restart_ maven goal

(e.g. execute _mvn jboss-jmx:restart_ from the command line of your project's root directory)
